short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block links on any website by domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Blocker disables all links to the websites you choose to blacklist.

Simply add the domains you want to block, and our extension will ensure that links pointing to these sites are blocked across all websites you visit. Take control of your online experience, improve productivity, and stay safe with BlockLinks.

For Who is This Extension Built:
- Parents: Protect your children from harmful or distracting websites.
- Professionals: Enhance productivity by blocking access to time-wasting sites.
- Students: Focus on studies without the distraction of social media or entertainment sites.
- Anyone Concerned with Online Safety: Avoid malicious or unwanted sites effortlessly.

This extension is open sourced on github: https://github.com/NicolasMICAUX/link-blocker-extension Please contribute if you have ideas to improve it.

More extension by Nicolas Micaux: https://chromewebstore.google.com/search/micaux.nicolas
